resources.string:
1. There are 2 sections Basic Maths and Gernal Knowledge, you have to select any one of them 
 2.In each seaction there are 3 levels Beginner,Intermediate and Expert 
 3. In each secton there is a different time limit, for Beginner it's 10sec, for Intermediate it's 20sec and for Expert it's 30sec 
 4. For each right answer +1 marks, for every wrong answer -0.25 marks and for not attemped 0 marks will be given
